mapper.select: select dict_label label, dict_value value, style from base_dict where del_flag = 0 and dict_type = #{type} and parent_id is not null order by dict_sort

select d.*,db.dict_label status_name from base_dict d left join base_dict db on db.dict_value = CONVERT(d.status,char ) and db.dict_type='base_status' where d.del_flag = 0
and d.dict_label like "%"#{dictLabel}"%"
and d.dict_type = #{dictType}
and d.parent_id is null
and d.create_time > FROM_UNIXTIME(#{params.startTime}/1000)
and d.create_time <= adddate(FROM_UNIXTIME(#{params.endTime}/1000),1)
order by d.create_time

select d.*, db.dict_label status_name from base_dict d left join base_dict db on db.dict_value = CONVERT(d.status, char) and db.dict_type = 'base_status' where d.del_flag = 0 and d.parent_id = #{dictId}
mapper.delete: update base_dict set del_flag = 1, update_time=sysdate() where parent_id = #{parentId}
